name: Stats Type:
description: Select your prefered way to display the gameplay statistics.

name: Extra Stats:
description: Select your prefered way to display some additional statistics. (such as sicks, goods, etc.)

name: Stats Background
description: If checked, adds translucent boxes under most HUD elements for better visibility.

name: Health Bar Gradient
description: If checked, replaces the Health Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Time Bar Gradient
description: If checked, replaces the Time Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Colored Text
description: If checked, most text elements in the HUD will be colorized.

name: Replace Combo Pop-Outs
description: If checked, removes FNF's combo pop-outs and replaces them with the SaraHUD version.

name: Lane Underlay:
description: How transparent should the Lane Underlay be.

name: Opponent Underlay
description: If checked, adds Lane Underlay for the opponent.
